column4: Is there a place where I could download and install all of WIndows 7 default fonts?
theres the msttcorefonts package i belive that gets most of the ms fonts
Would copying fonts from Windows 7 work on Ubuntu?
thats an easy way to get them. Put them in your .fonts directory
i make a .fonts dir. put them in there. then link them to  be synced by my ubuntu one account. ;)
